title: Atmospheric Flash And Compositional Analysis
description: Compositional Analysis contains properties that generally include mole and mass percents of: total fluid, flashed gas and flashed liquid, and individual components (e.g., C1, C2, C3…).

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis

Meta.title: Meta
Meta.description: A meta data item, which allows the association of named properties or property values to a Unit/Measurement/CRS/Azimuth/Time context.

items.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data Item
items.description: A meta data item, which allows the association of named properties or property values to a Unit/Measurement/CRS/Azimuth/Time context.

kind.title: UOM Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, 'Unit' for FrameOfReferenceUOM.

name.title: UOM Unit Symbol
name.description: The unit symbol or name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: UOM Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the Unit.

unitOfMeasureID.description: SRN to unit of measure reference.

propertyNames.title: UOM Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides Unit context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: CRS Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'CRS' for FrameOfReferenceCRS.

persistableReference.title: CRS Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the CRS.

propertyNames.title: CRS Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides CRS context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: DateTime Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'DateTime', for FrameOfReferenceDateTime.

name.title: DateTime Name
name.description: The name of the DateTime format and reference.

persistableReference.title: DateTime Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying DateTime reference.

propertyNames.title: DateTime Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides DateTime context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: AzimuthReference Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'AzimuthReference', for FrameOfReferenceAzimuthReference.

name.title: AzimuthReference Name
name.description: The name of the CRS or the symbol/name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: AzimuthReference Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying AzimuthReference.

propertyNames.title: AzimuthReference Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides AzimuthReference context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: A number for this test for purposes of e.g., tracking lab sequence.

FlashPressure.title: Flash Pressure
FlashPressure.description: Pressure at which the sample is flashed.

FlashTemperature.title: Flash Temperature
FlashTemperature.description: Temperature at which the sampleis flashed.

CompositionalAnalysis.title: Compositional Analysis
CompositionalAnalysis.description: Compositional Analysis contains properties that generally include mole and mass percents of: total fluid, flashed gas and flashed liquid, and individual components (e.g., C1, C2, C3…).

items.title: Compositional Analysis
items.description: Compositional Analysis contains properties that generally include mole and mass percents of: total fluid, flashed gas and flashed liquid, and individual components (e.g., C1, C2, C3…).

FlashedLiquidRelativeMass.title: Flashed Liquid Relative Mass
FlashedLiquidRelativeMass.description: The relative mass of the component in the flashed liquid.

FlashedGasRelativeMass.title: Flashed Gas Relative Mass
FlashedGasRelativeMass.description: The relative mass of the component in the flashed gas.

OverallFluidRelativeMass.title: Overall Fluid Relative Mass
OverallFluidRelativeMass.description: The relative mass of the component in the flashed liquid.

FlashedLiquidRelativeMole.title: Flashed Liquid Relative Mole
FlashedLiquidRelativeMole.description: The relative molar weight of the component in the flashed liquid.
FlashedLiquidRelativeMole.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

FlashedGasRelativeMole.title: Flashed Gas Relative Mole
FlashedGasRelativeMole.description: The relative molar weight of the component in the flashed gas.
FlashedGasRelativeMole.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

OverallFluidRelativeMole.title: Overall Fluid Relative Mole
OverallFluidRelativeMole.description: The relative mass of the component in the overall fluid.
OverallFluidRelativeMole.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

OverallFluidSpecificGravity.title: Overall Fluid Specific Gravity
OverallFluidSpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component in the overall fluid.

OverallFluidMolecularWeight.title: Overall Fluid Molecular Weight
OverallFluidMolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the component in the overall fluid.

AvgFlashedLiquidMolecularWeight.title: Avg Flashed Liquid Molecular Weight
AvgFlashedLiquidMolecularWeight.description: The average mole weight of the flashed liquid.

AvgFlashedGasMolecularWeight.title: Avg Flashed Gas Molecular Weight
AvgFlashedGasMolecularWeight.description: The average mole weight of the flashed gas.

AvgOverallFluidMolecularWeight.title: Avg Overall Fluid Molecular Weight
AvgOverallFluidMolecularWeight.description: The average mole weight of the overall fluid.

FlashedLiquidDensity.title: Flashed Liquid Density
FlashedLiquidDensity.description: The density of the flashed liquid at standard condition.

FlashedGasDensity.title: Flashed Gas Density
FlashedGasDensity.description: The density of the flashed gas at standard condition.

FlashedOverallFluidDensity.title: Flashed Overall Fluid Density
FlashedOverallFluidDensity.description: The density of the overall fluid.

FlashedLiquidRealRelativeDensity.title: Flashed Liquid Real Relative Density
FlashedLiquidRealRelativeDensity.description: The real relative density of the flashed liquid.

FlashedGasRealRelativeDensity.title: Flashed Gas Real Relative Density
FlashedGasRealRelativeDensity.description: The real relative density of the flashed gas.

OverallFluidRealRelativeDensity.title: Overall Fluid Real Relative Density
OverallFluidRealRelativeDensity.description: The real relative density of the overall fluid.

OverallFluidGasOilRatio.title: Overall Fluid Gas Oil Ratio
OverallFluidGasOilRatio.description: The gas-oil ratio of the overall fluid.

FlashedLiquidMoleFraction.title: Flashed Liquid Mole Fraction
FlashedLiquidMoleFraction.description: The mole fraction of the flashed liquid.
FlashedLiquidMoleFraction.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

FlashedGasMoleFraction.title: Flashed Gas Mole Fraction
FlashedGasMoleFraction.description: The mole fraction of the flashed gas.
FlashedGasMoleFraction.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

OverallFluidMoleFraction.title: Overall Fluid Mole Fraction
OverallFluidMoleFraction.description: The mole fraction of the overall fluid.
OverallFluidMoleFraction.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

FlashedLiquidMassFraction.title: Flashed Liquid Mas sFraction
FlashedLiquidMassFraction.description: The mass fraction of the flashed liquid.

FlashedGasMassFraction.title: Flashed Gas Mass Fraction
FlashedGasMassFraction.description: The mass fraction of the flashed gas.

OverallFluidMassFraction.title: Overall Fluid Mass Fraction
OverallFluidMassFraction.description: The mass fraction of the overall fluid.

FlashedGasGravity.title: Flashed Gas Gravity
FlashedGasGravity.description: The gravity of flashed gas, represented the molecular weight of the gas divided by the molecular weight of air.

FlashedLiquidAPIGravity.title: Flashed Liquid API Gravity
FlashedLiquidAPIGravity.description: The API Gravity of the flashed liquid.

FlashedLiquidRelativeMole.title: Flashed Liquid Relative Mole
FlashedLiquidRelativeMole.description: The relative molar concentration of the component in the flashed liquid.
FlashedLiquidRelativeMole.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

FlashedGasRelativeMole.title: Flashed Gas Relative Mole
FlashedGasRelativeMole.description: The relative molar concentration of the component in the flashed gas.
FlashedGasRelativeMole.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

OverallFluidRelativeMole.title: Overall Fluid Relative Mole
OverallFluidRelativeMole.description: The relative molar concentration of the component in the overall fluid.
OverallFluidRelativeMole.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

FlashedLiquidMolecularWeight.title: Flashed Liquid Molecular Weight
FlashedLiquidMolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the flashed liquid in the overall fluid.

FlashedGasMolecularWeight.title: Flashed Gas Molecular Weight
FlashedGasMolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the flashed gas in the overall fluid.

OverallFluidMolecularWeight.title: Overall Fluid Molecular Weight
OverallFluidMolecularWeight.description: The molecular weight of the overall fluid.

FlashedLiquidDensity.title: Flashed Liquid Density
FlashedLiquidDensity.description: The density of the component in the flashed liquid at standard condition.

FlashedGasDensity.title: Flashed Gas Density
FlashedGasDensity.description: The density of the component in the flashed gas at standard condition.

OverallFluidDensity.title: Overall Fluid Density
OverallFluidDensity.description: The density of the component within the overall fluid at standard condition.

FlashedLiquidRelativeMass.title: Flashed Liquid Relative Mass
FlashedLiquidRelativeMass.description: The relative mass of the component in the flashed liquid.
FlashedLiquidRelativeMass.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

FlashedGasRelativeMass.title: Flashed Gas Relative Mass
FlashedGasRelativeMass.description: The relative mass of the component in the flashed gas.
FlashedGasRelativeMass.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

OverallFluidRelativeMass.title: Overall Fluid Relative Mass
OverallFluidRelativeMass.description: The relative mass of the component in the flashed liquid.
OverallFluidRelativeMass.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

OverallFluidSpecificGravity.title: Overall Fluid Specific Gravity
OverallFluidSpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component in the overall fluid.  It is typical for either Specific Gravity or Density to be reported, but not necessarily both.

FlashedGasSpecificGravity.title: Flashed Gas Specific Gravity
FlashedGasSpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component in the flashed gas. It is typical for either Specific Gravity or Density to be reported, but not necessarily both.

FlashedLiquidSpecificGravity.title: Flashed Liquid Specific Gravity
FlashedLiquidSpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component in the flashed liquid. It is typical for either Specific Gravity or Density to be reported, but not necessarily both.

GasCompositionalCalculations.title: Gas Compositional Calculations
GasCompositionalCalculations.description: Calculations related to the composition of the gas.

items.title: Gas Compositional Calculations
items.description: Calculations related to the composition of the gas.

Density.title: Density
Density.description: Mass per volume of the component within the sample at standard condition.

OilCompositionalCalculations.title: Oil Compositional Calculations
OilCompositionalCalculations.description: Calculations related to the composition of the oil.

items.title: Oil Compositional Calculations
items.description: Calculations related to the composition of the oil.

Density.title: Density
Density.description: Mass per volume of the component within the sample at standard condition.

ContaminationCorrection.title: Contamination Correction
ContaminationCorrection.description: This object captures if the reported compositional analysis is pre or post correction for mud contamination and the reported mud contamination percentage.

ContaminationCorrectionStatus.title: Contamination Correction Status
ContaminationCorrectionStatus.description: Status of correction for mud contamination.

ContaminantID.title: Contaminant ID
ContaminantID.description: The OSDU ID for the contaminant fluid sample record.

ReferenceFluidID.title: Reference Fluid ID
ReferenceFluidID.description: The fluid used as a reference to determine the degree of contamination, e.g. stock tank oil or reservoir fluid.

WeightFraction.title: Weight Fraction
WeightFraction.description: The degree of contamination as a fraction of weight.

VolumeFraction.title: Volume Fraction
VolumeFraction.description: The degree of contamination as a fraction of volume.

MoleFraction.title: Mole Fraction
MoleFraction.description: The degree of contamination as a molar fraction.
MoleFraction.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

StandardConditionPressure.title: Standard Condition Pressure
StandardConditionPressure.description: Pressure at which the Gas Oil Ratio is defined.

StandardConditionTemperature.title: Standard Condition Temperature
StandardConditionTemperature.description: Temperature at which the Gas Oil Ratio is defined.

InitialConditionPressure.title: Initial Condition Pressure
InitialConditionPressure.description: Initial pressure condition at the start of the experiment.

InitialConditionTemperature.title: Initial Condition Temperature
InitialConditionTemperature.description: Initial temperature condition at the start of the experiment.

InitialConditionFormationVolumeFactor.title: Initial Condition Formation Volume Factor
InitialConditionFormationVolumeFactor.description: The ratio of the volume of fluid in the reservoir to the volume of the fluid at the surface conditions, accounting for the effects of pressure and temperature.

InitialConditionSaturatedFluidDensity.title: Initial Condition Saturated Fluid Density
InitialConditionSaturatedFluidDensity.description: Density of saturated fluid at initial pressure and temperature conditions.

StandardConditionWaterDensity.title: Standard Condition Water Density
StandardConditionWaterDensity.description: The density of water at standard conditions.
